evidence.quote: A white space isn’t just a place where your competitors are absent. In fact, in most cases, there will be several competitors present.
Some think of white space as an open playing field, with no competition. A few look at it as an untapped market. But the general consensus is that white space refers to the gap between what your
The second reason why your business might not have any competition is that you’re simply ahead of the market. Of all the reasons, this is by far the least problematic.
